import asyncio
import httpx
import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv

load_dotenv\(\)
API_KEY = os.getenv\('FMP_API_KEY'\)
BASE = 'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api'

async def test_endpoint\(name, url\):
    async with httpx.AsyncClient\(timeout=15\) as client:
        try:
            r = await client.get\(url\)
            if r.status_code == 200:
                data = r.json\(\)
                if isinstance\(data, list\):
                    print\(f'  [PASS] {name} — {r.status_code}, {len\(data\)} items'\)
                elif isinstance\(data, dict\):
                    keys = list\(data.keys\(\)\)[:5]
                    print\(f'  [PASS] {name} — {r.status_code}, keys: {keys}'\)
                else:
                    print\(f'  [PASS] {name} — {r.status_code}'\)
            elif r.status_code == 403:
                print\(f'  [GATED] {name} — 403 Forbidden \(not on Starter plan\)'\)
            else:
                print\(f'  [FAIL] {name} — {r.status_code}: {r.text[:100]}'\)
        except Exception as e:
            print\(f'  [ERROR] {name} — {e}'\)

async def main\(\):
    print\('=== FMP API Endpoint Validation ==='\)
    print\(f'API Key: {API_KEY[:8]}...{API_KEY[-4:]}'\)
    print\(\)
    
    print\('1. PRICE ENDPOINTS'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Quote', f'{BASE}/v3/quote/NVDA?apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Historical', f'{BASE}/v3/historical-price-full/NVDA?apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Price Change', f'{BASE}/v3/stock-price-change/NVDA?apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Real-time Price', f'{BASE}/v3/stock/full/real-time-price/NVDA?apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    print\(\)
    
    print\('2. OPTIONS CHAIN'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Options v4', f'{BASE}/v4/options/chain?symbol=NVDA&apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Options v3', f'{BASE}/v3/stock/NVDA/options/chain?apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    print\(\)
    
    print\('3. EARNINGS ENDPOINTS'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Analyst Estimates', f'{BASE}/v3/analyst-estimates/NVDA?apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Earnings Surprises', f'{BASE}/v3/earnings-surprises/NVDA?apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Earnings Calendar', f'{BASE}/v3/earning_calendar?apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    print\(\)
    
    print\('4. SENTIMENT & NEWS'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Social Sentiment', f'{BASE}/v4/social-sentiments?symbol=NVDA&apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    await test_endpoint\('Stock News', f'{BASE}/v3/stock_news?tickers=NVDA&limit=5&apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    print\(\)
    
    print\('5. HYPERSCALER DATA'\)
    await test_endpoint\('MSFT Cash Flow', f'{BASE}/v3/cash-flow-statement/MSFT?period=quarter&limit=2&apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    await test_endpoint\('MSFT Income Stmt', f'{BASE}/v3/income-statement/MSFT?period=quarter&limit=2&apikey={API_KEY}'\)
    print\(\)
    
    print\('6. TRANSCRIPTS'\)
    await test_endpoint\('NVDA Transcript', f'{BASE}/v4/earning_call_transcript?symbol=NVDA&year=2025&quarter=3&apikey={API_KEY}'\)

asyncio.run\(main\(\)\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /c/Users/ReachElysium/Documents/NVDA6900_2 && python -c "
import asyncio, httpx, os
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv\(\)
K = os.getenv\('FMP_API_KEY'\)
B = 'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api'

async def t\(name, url\):
    async with httpx.AsyncClient\(timeout=15\) as c:
        try:
            r = await c.get\(url\)
            if r.status_code == 200:
                d = r.json\(\)
                n = len\(d\) if isinstance\(d, list\) else len\(d.keys\(\)\)
                print\(f'PASS  {name} — 200, {n} items/keys'\)
            elif r.status_code == 403:
                print\(f'GATED {name} — 403 \(plan restriction\)'\)
            else:
                print\(f'FAIL  {name} — {r.status_code}'\)
        except Exception as e:
            print\(f'ERROR {name} — {e}'\)

async def main\(\):
    tests = [
        \('Quote NVDA', f'{B}/v3/quote/NVDA?apikey={K}'\),
        \('Historical NVDA', f'{B}/v3/historical-price-full/NVDA?apikey={K}'\),
        \('Price Change', f'{B}/v3/stock-price-change/NVDA?apikey={K}'\),
        \('Options v4', f'{B}/v4/options/chain?symbol=NVDA&apikey={K}'\),
        \('Analyst Estimates', f'{B}/v3/analyst-estimates/NVDA?apikey={K}'\),
        \('Earnings Surprises', f'{B}/v3/earnings-surprises/NVDA?apikey={K}'\),
        \('Earnings Calendar', f'{B}/v3/earning_calendar?apikey={K}'\),
        \('Social Sentiment', f'{B}/v4/social-sentiments?symbol=NVDA&apikey={K}'\),
        \('Stock News', f'{B}/v3/stock_news?tickers=NVDA&limit=5&apikey={K}'\),
        \('MSFT Cash Flow', f'{B}/v3/cash-flow-statement/MSFT?period=quarter&limit=2&apikey={K}'\),
        \('MSFT Income', f'{B}/v3/income-statement/MSFT?period=quarter&limit=2&apikey={K}'\),
        \('NVDA Transcript', f'{B}/v4/earning_call_transcript?symbol=NVDA&year=2025&quarter=3&apikey={K}'\),
    ]
    for name, url in tests:
        await t\(name, url\)

asyncio.run\(main\(\)\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd /c/Users/ReachElysium/Documents/NVDA6900_2 && python -c "
import httpx, os
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv\(\)
K = os.getenv\('FMP_API_KEY'\)
print\(f'Key length: {len\(K\)}, starts: {K[:8]}'\)
r = httpx.get\(f'https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v3/quote/NVDA?apikey={K}', timeout=15\)
print\(f'Status: {r.status_code}'\)
print\(f'Body: {r.text[:500]}'\)
print\(\)
# Try alternative auth method \(some FMP plans use headers\)
r2 = httpx.get\('https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/v3/quote/NVDA', headers={'Authorization': f'Bearer {K}'}, timeout=15\)
print\(f'Bearer auth status: {r2.status_code}'\)
print\(f'Bearer body: {r2.text[:300]}'\)
" 2>&1)
